Articles.Content: Is this 1.2.2 compatible?
I haven't encountered any weirdness with 1.22 so far, so yes, it should be

[@Fireheart318](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/159932-fireheart318/) [@FirroSeranel](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/144343-firroseranel/) [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/) Pardon me for poking a dead horse. On the subject of SCRamjets, I've had much fun learning for myself and designing crafts around the Hyperblast since I first encountered it in KSP 1.0.5. I find this engine quite magical and easy to use, actually. The issues I have are that:

1. Other M2X ramjets aren't <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr> enough (even modestly) to help get the Hyperblast going, and certain M2X fuselage parts don't have the heat tolerance to survive the levels that my hypersonic vessels can go or intend to go.
2. I don't mean to offend but the M2X hypersonic cockpit and nose don't have the skin to keep up. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") My NOX family spaceplanes all end up with OPT cockpits or a stock heatshield on their nose... Or both, which is actually very reasonable, IRL physics and their rated speeds considered.

This craft, the NOX Palladium, is a small treasure. It has 1x Hyperblast, 2x J-58 Afterburn and 2x Rapiers in their own action groups for efficiency if not intended to hypercruise, or if intending to trample through the Stratosphere and get to hypercruise. By the way I welcome the suggestion that the Afterburn should be buffed, or a higher end ramjet be added as it saddened me to add the Rapiers for this reason. The palladium easily claims an apoapsis of 500km before running too low on fuel to circularize in orbit--and that's without a stock nuke attached so it can operate in space, but then the craft falls out of its very delicate <abbr title="Thrust-to-weight ratio">TWR</abbr> profile and can't build the prerequisite speed anymore to be worth anything.

![2D9M9Hj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2D9M9Hj.jpg)

[http://imgur.com/a/6RzO5](http://imgur.com/a/6RzO5)

This one is the NOX Crown, my pride and joy among spaceplanes. It's a very heavy, and near-perfect multipurpose vessel. Despite its many OPT engines, those alone are not enough to make it a king among spaceplanes. It has 4x Hyperblast engines and can clip Eve's Periapsis (but useful remaining <abbr title="Delta-V">dV</abbr> ends there) before leaving Kerbin's atmosphere. The best part is that it and any other NOX family planes need *No Oxidzer™* to do their jobs.

![CidUzNk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CidUzNk.jpg)

I love this . I was looking for an engines to make a spaceplane in 10x kerbin and here comes the mighty SCRAM that works like SCRAM not some "limited to mah 6 jet engine"   .I love it

Now please tell me there is planned larger version of scram engine so i can start working on cargo spaceplane ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon2.png ":o")

You might wanna check out the Mark IV from the same author as this mod

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, SkyKaptn said:
> 
> 
> You might wanna check out the Mark IV from the same author as this mod
> 

Mark IV Spaceplane Parts is by the famous [@Nertea](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/83952-nertea/) while Mk2 and Mk3 Expansions are by [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/). Both wonderful modders but not the same person.

Unless they've been hiding it from us all this time...

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, Esquire42 said:
> 
> 
> Mark IV Spaceplane Parts is by the famous [@Nertea](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/83952-nertea/) while Mk2 and Mk3 Expansions are by [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/). Both wonderful modders but not the same person.
> 

Oops, you are absolutely right sir

[@Karamon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165448-karamon/) This is why I love the M2X Scramjet. It's not a "hybrid" that starts like any other turbojet and has just a little more lifespan than the next engine. This is the real deal, a thoroughbred scramjet. Sadly I don't think [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/) has made any other scramjets (I do hope he makes a Mk3 one as well) but if you lookup the old parts pack Mk3 Hypersonic Systems in the meantime, you will find a a suite of beastly 2.5m and 3.75m turboramjets and a super-heavy radial Mk3 Scramjet.

Spoiler

This plane made 3 <abbr title="Thrust-to-weight ratio">TWR</abbr> in just a few seconds on the runway in stock scale with at least 60 tons cargo and easy leaped several hundred km into space and still had amazing <abbr title="Delta-V">dV</abbr> to spare.

![ltGVcGo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ltGVcGo.jpg)![Bmqmrkn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Bmqmrkn.jpg)

I very rarely use Mk3 parts, personally, but I'd be as happy as anyone if an M3X scramjet appeared!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-19T04:35:51Z" title="12/19/2016 04:35  AM" data-short="7 yr">December 19, 2016</time> by JadeOfMaar**
You should add an expanded R-71 cockpit to add the second kerbal to it like it's real life counterpart.

MKIV does not have any good engines . Ok they are good but for stock game . AS i mentioned i play 10x scale and SMURFF set to 1 so my orbital velocity starts around 7500 m/s so engines "WhateverSizeCloneSabre" are far from doing anything useful, 2000 m/s to start rocket engines and 30 km height is simply not working .

First fast build hypersonic drone did 4000 m/s and more than 50 000 meters, i was climbing too steep and it flamed out  . So the difference is huge and i bet i can get close to 5000 m/s and around 60 000 m if i fly correctly and build vessel corectly

First off, those are some nice looking planes

Secondly, don't mean to self-advertise here, but I'm working on a mod that allows active cooling on wing surface (linked in my signature), at the cost of a significant chunk of electric charge. Eventually the plan is to add open and closed loop cooling in addition to the pure electric one currently implemented. This might solve your heating problem.

No need, i hit the wall ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") i got too mah 16 and my planes became very unstable, i need totally different aproach and learn some basics how to buil prober plane cause untill now i focused mainly on rockets . But still awesome mod man, i mostly like that most of the parts have real use in-game . Rovers, planes , planes for no-oxigen planets , landers , vtols , vacuum vtols tons of options . In many mods i delete half of the useless parts that are garbage and here whenever i look there is ton of options

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-19T21:20:56Z" title="12/19/2016 09:20  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 19, 2016</time> by Karamon**

I am having a problem with the CB-C cockpit, it says there are 3 variants of it. When I select it and place it I have all 3 variants as one part, and there is no way to select which variant I want. Could anyone point out what I am doing wrong, or if I am missing a specific mod to allow the part change, thanks.

@Derpist: M2X needs InterstellarFuelSwitch for the variant parts to function; IFS comes bundled with M2X if downloaded from SpaceDock or can be downloaded alongside if using <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>.
Thanks for the reply man, Merry Christmas.

Merry ChristKwanHanuFestiSol, everyone. Mk2Expansion  gets a holiday update, M2X 1.7.26; grab from the [Usual](http://spacedock.info/mod/473/Mk2%20Stockalike%20Expansion) [Places.](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk2Expansion/releases/tag/1.7.26)  

Changelog:

Spoiler

-New Part: Shrouded Thermal Control System  

-Part Rework: Hypersonic Nosecone  

-Part Rework: Spadetail  

-Hypersonic Cockpit and Hypersonic nosecone max temp increased  

-Fixed engine FX, removes Aero FX/Engine FX interaction  

-Tweaked Afterburn thrust curve  

-'Vector' turbojet mass reduced  

-'Wedge' Linear Aerospike mass reduced  

-'Sledgehammer' Air-Augmented rocket thrust reduced  

-Various part costs adjusted to be more in line with stock prices

Mach 16? Surely you had the heat cheat on for that. ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon2.png ":o") I've seen Mach 11 without it but by then my engines were dead and Oberth was carrying me up (stock scale).

Don't forget bases and stations. M2X is quite nice for those too. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)") They just need a new flavor of creative juice.

The problem is that i cannot recreate it now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

First attempt was just fast built plane without "proper balancig"  and it flew very good untill fuel run out around mah 15-16 . Now when i balance <abbr title="Center of Lift">CoL</abbr> and <abbr title="Center of Mass">CoM</abbr> try building proper plane fastest i got was mach 13 and planes lose stability .

I use SMURFF set to 1 so it makes everything lighter and add some more power to engines so that might be the case , plus my atmosphere is 20% higher so a little more air on higher alts .

About heat , yes plane started to build up heat but it could go a little more . No hax , maybe <abbr title="Ferram Aerospace Research (mod)">FAR</abbr> is the cause

I just started new career and build most basic planes to really learn how to make them fly properly so maybe later i'll make a spaceplane .

When did this start to require Intersteller Fuel Switch?

I could have sworn it didn't before (like pre-1.0 days).

I don't like IFS because it wants to switch between a bunch of stuff I don't have.
I'm just looking for a Mk2 bicoupler that has only liquid fuel, as it is missing from stock(Wich is needed) Does this mod have that? i didn't finde one on the list or the album
